00022 /**
00023  * @file   QuantMethodSamplerReport.h
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Wed Feb  1 09:09:36 2006
00026  * 
00027  * @brief  Class for reporting qc stats to a file.
00028  */
00029 #ifndef _QUANTMETHODSAMPLERREPORT_H_
00030 #define _QUANTMETHODSAMPLERREPORT_H_
00031 
00032 //
00033 #include "chipstream/QuantExprMethod.h"
00034 #include "chipstream/QuantMethodReport.h"
00035 #include "stats/stats.h"
00036 #include "util/Err.h"
00037 #include "util/Fs.h"
00038 #include "util/Util.h"
00039 //
00040 #include <cstring>
00041 #include <string>
00042 //
00043 class QuantMethodSamplerReport : public QuantMethodReport {
00044 public:
00045 
00046   /** 
00047    * Constructor.
00048    *  
00049    * @param reportModulus - Sampling rate for how often a report is
00050    * generated. For example 9 means that 1 out of every 10 probeset
00051    * groups will be reported on.
00052    * @param prefix - Prefix name for report files, usually something like experimentDir/rma
00053    * @param precision - How many digits to print after the decimal place.
00054    * @param doRawIntensities - Print a sampling report for raw probe intensities.
00055    * @param doSummaries - Print a sampling for general summaries.
00056    * @param doMadResiduals - Print a report for median absolute residuals.
00057    */
00058   QuantMethodSamplerReport(int reportModulus, 
00059                            const std::string& prefix,
00060                            int precision,
00061                            bool doRawIntensities,
00062                            bool doSummaries,
00063                            bool doMadResiduals) : 
00064     m_Modulus(reportModulus),
00065     m_Prefix(prefix),
00066     m_Precision(precision),
00067     m_DoRawIntensity(doRawIntensities),
00068     m_DoSummaries(doSummaries),
00069     m_DoMadResiduals(doMadResiduals) {
00070     m_ModCount = 0;
00071     m_Delim = '\t';
00072     m_IntensityCount = 0; 
00073     m_IntensityModulus = m_Modulus;
00074   }
00075   
00076   /** 
00077    * Get set up for a run of reporting probesets. Often used to open file
00078    * streams and print headers to files etc.
00079    * 
00080    * @param qMethod - Quantification method to be used.
00081    * @param layout - Where the probesets, probes, etc are on the chip.
00082    * 
00083    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00084    */
00085   bool prepare(QuantMethod &qMethod, const IntensityMart &iMart) {
00086     QuantExprMethod *qeMethod = dynamic_cast<QuantExprMethod *>(&qMethod);
00087     if(qeMethod == NULL)
00088       Err::errAbort("Can't have a QuantMethodSamplerReport object called with things other than QuantExprMethod objects");
00089     if(m_DoRawIntensity)
00090       Fs::mustOpenToWrite(m_RawOut, m_Prefix + ".intensities.qc.txt");
00091     if(m_DoSummaries)
00092       Fs::mustOpenToWrite(m_SummariesOut, m_Prefix + ".summaries.qc.txt");
00093     if(m_DoMadResiduals && qeMethod->haveResiduals()) {
00094       Fs::mustOpenToWrite(m_MadOut, m_Prefix + ".mad-residuals.qc.txt");
00095       m_MadOut.setf(ios::fixed, ios::floatfield);
00096       m_MadOut.precision(m_Precision);
00097     }
00098     else
00099       m_DoMadResiduals = false;
00100     
00101     return true;
00102   }
00103   
00104   /** 
00105    * Print out the median absolute residual (MAD) for probeset group.
00106    * 
00107    * @param out - Stream we are printing to.
00108    * @param psGroup - Group containing probes to print out.
00109    * @param qMethod - Quantification method to query for residuals.
00110    */
00111   void reportMadResiduals(std::ofstream &out, ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, 
00112                           QuantExprMethod &qMethod) {
00113     out << psGroup.name;
00114     std::vector<float> residuals;
00115     residuals.reserve(qMethod.getNumTargets());
00116 
00117     for(size_t chipIx = 0; chipIx < qMethod.getNumTargets(); chipIx++) {
00118       out.put(m_Delim);
00119       residuals.clear();
00120       /* Get all the absolute values of the residuals in a vector. */
00121       for(size_t featureIx = 0; featureIx < qMethod.getNumFeatures(); featureIx++) {
00122         residuals.push_back(fabs(float(qMethod.getResidual(featureIx, chipIx))));
00123       }
00124       /* median residual for a particular chip is what we report. */
00125       double mad = median(residuals.begin(), residuals.end());
00126       out << mad;
00127     }
00128     out << std::endl;
00129   }
00130   
00131   /** 
00132    * Report the summary value for a particular probeset group.
00133    * 
00134    * @param out - Stream we are printing to.
00135    * @param psGroup - Group of probesets used to make summary.
00136    * @param qMethod - Quantification method to query for summaries.
00137    */
00138   void reportSummaries(std::ofstream &out, ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, 
00139                        QuantExprMethod &qMethod) {
00140     out << psGroup.name;
00141     for(size_t chipIx = 0; chipIx < qMethod.getNumTargets(); chipIx++) {
00142       out.put(m_Delim);
00143       double summary = qMethod.getTargetEffect(chipIx);
00144       out << summary;
00145     }
00146     out << std::endl;
00147   }
00148 
00149   /** 
00150    * Print out the log2() intensities of PM probes in psGroup.
00151    * 
00152    * @param out - Stream we are printing to.
00153    * @param psGroup - Group of probesets that have PM probes to report.
00154    * @param iMart - Table to look up probe intensities in.
00155    */
00156   void reportIntensities(std::ofstream &out, ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, const IntensityMart &iMart) {
00157     unsigned int psIx = 0, atomIx = 0, probeIx = 0, chipIx = 0;
00158     for(psIx = 0; psIx < psGroup.probeSets.size(); psIx++) {
00159       const ProbeSet *ps = psGroup.probeSets[psIx];
00160       for(atomIx = 0; atomIx < ps->atoms.size(); atomIx++) {
00161         Atom *a = ps->atoms[atomIx];
00162         unsigned int channelIx = a->getChannelCode();
00163         for(probeIx = 0; probeIx < a->probes.size(); probeIx++) {
00164           Probe *p = a->probes[probeIx];
00165           if(Probe::isPm(*p)) {
00166             out << psGroup.name << "." << p->id;
00167             for(chipIx = 0; chipIx < iMart.getCelFileCount(); chipIx++) {
00168               out.put(m_Delim);
00169               out << log2(max(iMart.getProbeIntensity(p->id, chipIx, channelIx),FLT_MIN));
00170             } 
00171             out << std::endl;
00172           } /* if pm probe. */
00173         } /* probes. */
00174       } /* atoms. */
00175     } /* probesets. */
00176   }
00177                          
00178 
00179   /** 
00180    * After every probeset computation this function is called an is an opportunity
00181    * to query the quantification method for results, residuals, etc.
00182    * 
00183    * @param psGroup - List of probesets from which probes were used.
00184    * @param qMethod - Quantification method with compute method called.
00185    * @param layout - Where the probesets, probes, etc are on the chip.
00186    * 
00187    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00188    */
00189   bool report(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, 
00190               QuantMethod &qMethod,
00191               const IntensityMart &iMart, 
00192               std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00193               PmAdjuster &pmAdjust) {
00194     QuantExprMethod *qeMethod = dynamic_cast<QuantExprMethod *>(&qMethod);
00195     if(qeMethod == NULL)
00196       Err::errAbort("Can't have a QuantMethodSamplerReport object called with things other than QuantExprMethod objects");
00197     /* Only report some probesets, specifically total/(m_Modulus+1) of all probesets. */
00198     if(m_ModCount-- <= 0) {
00199       if(m_DoMadResiduals) 
00200         reportMadResiduals(m_MadOut, psGroup, *qeMethod);
00201       if(m_DoRawIntensity) {
00202         /* We're not reporting all probes for all sampled probesets, would be too many. */
00203         if(m_IntensityCount-- <= 0) {
00204           reportIntensities(m_RawOut, psGroup, iMart);
00205           m_IntensityCount = m_IntensityModulus;
00206         }
00207       }
00208       if(m_DoSummaries) {
00209         reportSummaries(m_SummariesOut, psGroup, *qeMethod);
00210       }
00211       m_ModCount = m_Modulus;
00212     }
00213     return true;
00214   };
00215   
00216   /** 
00217    * No more probesets will be processed, this is a chance to finish outputting
00218    * results and clean up.
00219    * 
00220    * @param qMethod - Quantification method that was used.
00221    * 
00222    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00223    */
00224   bool finish(QuantMethod &qMethod) {
00225     if(m_RawOut.is_open()) 
00226       m_RawOut.close();
00227     if(m_SummariesOut.is_open()) 
00228       m_SummariesOut.close();
00229     if(m_MadOut.is_open()) 
00230       m_MadOut.close();
00231     return true;
00232   }
00233 
00234 private:
00235 
00236   int m_Modulus; ///< How often do we sample from reports given (i.e. 9 means 1 in 10 probesets gets reported.
00237   std::string m_Prefix; ///< Prefix for filenames.
00238   int m_Precision; ///< How many digits after the decimal place to output.
00239   bool m_DoRawIntensity; ///< Output raw intensities for probesets seen?
00240   bool m_DoSummaries;    ///< Output summarized values for probesets seen?
00241   bool m_DoMadResiduals; ///< Output median absolute residual for each probeset seen?
00242   char m_Delim; ///< What delimiter to use for fields, currently a tab.
00243   int m_ModCount; ///< How many probesets have we seen since last sampling.
00244   int m_IntensityModulus; ///< How often are we going to print the raw intensities of an entire probe set?
00245   int m_IntensityCount;   ///< Counter for how many probesets we have seen since last intensity sampling.
00246   std::vector<std::string> m_ColNames; ///< Names of columns
00247   std::ofstream m_RawOut;  ///< File for outputting raw values.
00248   std::ofstream m_SummariesOut; ///< File for outputting summaries.
00249   std::ofstream m_MadOut;       ///< File for outputting MAD values.
00250 };
00251 
00252 #endif /* _QUANTMETHODSAMPLERREPORT_H_ */
